description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-21363):

1. Download and apply the relevant KB update based on your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates to address this vulnerability include:
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected builds before proceeding.
- Backup critical data before applying the update.
